name: Hudson Technologies, Inc.
description: Hudson Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative solutions for the refrigeration and air conditioning industry. Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Pearl River, New York, Hudson Technologies specializes in reclaiming, recycling, and reusing refrigerants, which helps reduce environmental impact and promotes sustainability. The company offers a wide range of services, including refrigerant management, HVAC services, and energy efficiency solutions. Hudson's proprietary technology allows for the recovery and reclamation of refrigerants, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations while offering cost-effective solutions to their clients. The company is committed to supporting its customers through education and expertise in refrigerant management, as well as providing high-quality products such as refrigerant gases and equipment. Hudson Technologies serves a diverse clientele, including commercial and industrial businesses, and is recognized for its integrity and commitment to service excellence. As environmental regulations continue to evolve, Hudson Technologies is well-positioned to be a key player in the transition towards more sustainable practices within the HVAC industry.
